alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN GREENSVILLE AND SOUTHERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF FRANKLIN... At 519 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Claresville, or 9 miles west of Boykins, moving east at 50 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail are possible with this storm. This storm will be near... Boykins around 530 PM EDT. Newsoms around 535 PM EDT. Courtland around 540 PM EDT. Franklin, Hunterdale and Sedley around 545 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Adams Grove, Sunbeam, Handsom, Lanes Corner, Branchville, Drewryville, Bryants Corner, Shiloh, Story and Little Texas. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
